name: Fort Lytton Noir
description:
In the down town, waste ridden city of Fort Lytton, there is crime everywhere to be found. Detective Brooks is on a nearly cold case for a murder, its up to him to find out what happened and where the sicko went. But you didn't get that reputation from being ignorant to the clues, The details are always in the shades.

Game Feats: 

multiple pick-up-able items.

Soundscape.

stylised real time cell shading.
